EmailTemplate.description: Send from Training Event to any one assigned a Learning Plan Phase II that hasn't completed within 30 days.
EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan Completion Reminder Phase II Fleet Small Business
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Learning Plan Misses You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Learning Plan is Waiting!
Hi ,
I'm just checking in to see how you're doing on completing your Learning Plan Phase II Fleet Small Business https://wexinc.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/700000009EOI/a/0g0000005cbX/L1.N0AZmeQJ27VcnqNr3ms6z0SHhSJb5WrmNAHiG6Yg
Once you've fully reviewed the Learning Plan, take the https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScTv4ST7yJfMTkEbzU-774vnzsSaJGEksSWEIDJAPpEqZGN2A/viewform?usp=sf_link to indicate that you've completed this training.
Please let me know any if you have any questions.
Thank You,
{!User.Name} WEX University Global Training
